data.message: How do you thank a person for providing you the strength...thank them for the courage,who's words and examples have allowed these things to manifest in their lives?! Well I'll just start by saying THANK YOU EM'! Below is the article of my situation but I wanted to let you know that your beats keep my hands up and head boppin',your lyrics keep me moving forward on many many days. I pray you continue to reach others'l lives' positively as you have mine. KEEP CRANKIN' 'EM out babyboi. ONE! ;)
